member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.DestroyOptions
member.summary: Options controlling the behavior of an operation.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.LocalProgramArgs
member.summary: Description of a stack backed by pre-existing local Pulumi CLI program.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace
member.summary:
LocalWorkspace is a default implementation of the Workspace interface.
A Workspace is the execution context containing a single Pulumi project, a program, and multiple stacks.Workspaces are used to manage the execution environment, providing various utilities such as plugin installation, environment configuration ($PULUMI_HOME), and creation, deletion, and listing of Stacks.
LocalWorkspace relies on Pulumi.yaml and Pulumi.{stack}.yaml as the intermediate format for Project and Stack settings.Modifying ProjectSettings will alter the Workspace Pulumi.yaml file, and setting config on a Stack will modify the Pulumi.{stack}.yaml file. This is identical to the behavior of Pulumi CLI driven workspaces.
If not provided a working directory - causing LocalWorkspace to create a temp directory, than the temp directory will be cleaned up on .

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace.CreateAsync(Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a workspace using the specified options. Used for maximal control and customization of the underlying environment before any stacks are created or selected.
member.param: Options used to configure the workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace.CreateStackAsync(Pulumi.Automation.InlineProgramArgs)
member.summary: Creates a Stack with a utilizing the specified inline (in process) . This program is fully debuggable and runs in process. If no option is specified, default project settings will be created on behalf of the user. Similarly, unless a option is specified, the working directory will default to a new temporary directory provided by the OS.
member.param: A set of arguments to initialize a Stack with an inline program that runs in process, as well as any additional customizations to be applied to the workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace.CreateStackAsync(Pulumi.Automation.InlineProgramArgs,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a Stack with a utilizing the specified inline (in process) . This program is fully debuggable and runs in process. If no option is specified, default project settings will be created on behalf of the user. Similarly, unless a option is specified, the working directory will default to a new temporary directory provided by the OS.
member.param: A set of arguments to initialize a Stack with an inline program that runs in process, as well as any additional customizations to be applied to the workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace.CreateStackAsync(Pulumi.Automation.LocalProgramArgs)
member.summary: Creates a Stack with a utilizing the local Pulumi CLI program from the specified . This is a way to create drivers on top of pre-existing Pulumi programs. This Workspace will pick up any available Settings files(Pulumi.yaml, Pulumi.{stack}.yaml).
member.param: A set of arguments to initialize a Stack with a pre-configured Pulumi CLI program that already exists on disk, as well as any additional customizations to be applied to the workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspace.CreateStackAsync(Pulumi.Automation.LocalProgramArgs,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a Stack with a utilizing the local Pulumi CLI program from the specified . This is a way to create drivers on top of pre-existing Pulumi programs. This Workspace will pick up any available Settings files(Pulumi.yaml, Pulumi.{stack}.yaml).
member.param: A set of arguments to initialize a Stack with a pre-configured Pulumi CLI program that already exists on disk, as well as any additional customizations to be applied to the workspace.

Similarly, unless a option is specified, the working directory will default to a new temporary directory provided by the OS.
member.param: A set of arguments to initialize a Stack with an inline program that runs in process, as well as any additional customizations to be applied to the workspace.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions
member.summary: Extensibility options to configure a LocalWorkspace; e.g: settings to seed and environment variables to pass through to every command.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.WorkDir
member.summary: The directory to run Pulumi commands and read settings (Pulumi.yaml and Pulumi.{stack}.yaml).

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.PulumiHome
member.summary: The directory to override for CLI metadata.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.SecretsProvider
member.summary:
The secrets provider to user for encryption and decryption of stack secrets.
See: https://www.pulumi.com/docs/intro/concepts/config/#available-encryption-providers

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.Program
member.summary:
The inline program to be used for Preview/Update operations if any.
If none is specified, the stack will refer to for this information.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.EnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Environment values scoped to the current workspace. These will be supplied to every Pulumi command.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.ProjectSettings
member.summary:
The settings object for the current project.
If provided when initializing a project settings file will be written to when the workspace is initialized via .

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.LocalWorkspaceOptions.StackSettings
member.summary:
A map of Stack names and corresponding settings objects.
If provided when initializing stack settings file(s) will be written to when the workspace is initialized via .

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.PreviewOptions
member.summary: Options controlling the behavior of an operation.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectBackend
member.summary: Configuration for the project's Pulumi state storage backend.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntime
member.summary: A description of the Project's program runtime and associated metadata.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntimeName
member.summary: Supported Pulumi program language runtimes.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntimeOptions
member.summary: Various configuration options that apply to different language runtimes.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntimeOptions.TypeScript
member.summary:
Applies to NodeJS projects only.
A boolean that controls whether to use ts-node to execute sources.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntimeOptions.Binary
member.summary:
Applies to Go and .NET project only.
Go: A string that specifies the name of a pre-build executable to look for on your path.
.NET: A string that specifies the path of a pre-build .NET assembly.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectRuntimeOptions.VirtualEnv
member.summary:
Applies to Python projects only.
A string that specifies the path to a virtual environment to use when running the program.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectSettings
member.summary: A Pulumi project manifest. It describes metadata applying to all sub-stacks created from the project.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectTemplate
member.summary: A template used to seed new stacks created from this project.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.ProjectTemplateConfigValue
member.summary: A placeholder config value for a project template.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.StackSettings.SecretsProvider
member.summary: This stack's secrets provider.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.StackSettings.EncryptedKey
member.summary: This is the KMS-encrypted ciphertext for the data key used for secrets encryption. Only used for cloud-based secrets providers.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.StackSettings.EncryptionSalt
member.summary: This is this stack's base64 encoded encryption salt. Only used for passphrase-based secrets providers.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.StackSettings.Config
member.summary: This is an optional configuration bag.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace
member.summary:
Workspace is the execution context containing a single Pulumi project, a program, and multiple stacks.
Workspaces are used to manage the execution environment, providing various utilities such as plugin installation, environment configuration ($PULUMI_HOME), and creation, deletion, and listing of Stacks.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.WorkDir
member.summary: The working directory to run Pulumi CLI commands.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.PulumiHome
member.summary:
The directory override for CLI metadata if set.
This customizes the location of $PULUMI_HOME where metadata is stored and plugins are installed.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SecretsProvider
member.summary:
The secrets provider to use for encryption and decryption of stack secrets.
See: https://www.pulumi.com/docs/intro/concepts/config/#available-encryption-providers

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.Program
member.summary:
The inline program to be used for Preview/Update operations if any.
If none is specified, the stack will refer to for this information.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.EnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Environment values scoped to the current workspace. These will be supplied to every Pulumi command.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.GetProjectSettingsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns project settings for the current project if any.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SaveProjectSettingsAsync(Pulumi.Automation.ProjectSettings,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Overwrites the settings for the current project.
There can only be a single project per workspace. Fails if new project name does not match old.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.GetStackSettingsAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns stack settings for the stack matching the specified stack name if any.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SaveStackSettingsAsync(System.String,Pulumi.Automation.StackSettings,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Overwrite the settings for the stack matching the specified stack name.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SerializeArgsForOpAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Hook to provide additional args to every CLI command before they are executed.
Provided with a stack name, returns an array of args to append to an invoked command ["--config=...", ].
does not utilize this extensibility point.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.PostCommandCallbackAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Hook executed after every command. Called with the stack name.
An extensibility point to perform workspace cleanup (CLI operations may create/modify a Pulumi.stack.yaml).
does not utilize this extensibility point.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.GetConfigValueAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the value associated with the specified stack name and key, scoped to the Workspace.
member.param: The name of the stack to read config from.
The key to use for the config lookup.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.GetConfigAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the config map for the specified stack name, scoped to the current Workspace.
member.param: The name of the stack to read config from.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SetConfigValueAsync(System.String,System.String,Pulumi.Automation.ConfigValue,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets the specified key-value pair in the provided stack's config.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SetConfigAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Pulumi.Automation.ConfigValue},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets all values in the provided config map for the specified stack name.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.
The config map to upsert against the existing config.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.RemoveConfigValueAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes the specified key-value pair from the provided stack's config.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.RemoveConfigAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes all values in the provided key collection from the config map for the specified stack name.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.
The collection of keys to remove from the underlying config map.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.RefreshConfigAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets and sets the config map used with the last update for the stack matching the specified stack name.
member.param: The name of the stack to operate on.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.WhoAmIAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the currently authenticated user.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.GetStackAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a summary of the currently selected stack, if any.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.CreateStackAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and sets a new stack with the specified stack name, failing if one already exists.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.CreateStackAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates and sets a new stack with the specified stack name, failing if one already exists.
member.exception: If a stack already exists by the provided name.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SelectStackAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Selects and sets an existing stack matching the stack name, failing if none exists.
member.exception: If no stack was found by the provided name.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.SelectStackAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Selects and sets an existing stack matching the stack name, failing if none exists.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.RemoveStackAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes the stack and all associated configuration and history.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.ListStacksAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Returns all stacks created under the current project.
This queries underlying backend and may return stacks not present in the Workspace (as Pulumi.{stack}.yaml files).

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.InstallPluginAsync(System.String,System.String,Pulumi.Automation.PluginKind,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Installs a plugin in the Workspace, for example to use cloud providers like AWS or GCP.
member.param: The version of the plugin e.g. "v1.0.0".

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.RemovePluginAsync(System.String,System.String,Pulumi.Automation.PluginKind,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes a plugin from the Workspace matching the specified name and version.
member.param: The optional name of the plugin.
The optional semver range to check when removing plugins matching the given name e.g. "1.0.0", ">1.0.0".

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.Workspace.ListPluginsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a list of all plugins installed in the Workspace.

member.name: T:Pulumi.Automation.XStack
member.summary:
is an isolated, independently configurable instance of a Pulumi program. exposes methods for the full pulumi lifecycle (up/preview/refresh/destroy), as well as managing configuration.
Multiple stacks are commonly used to denote different phases of development (such as development, staging, and production) or feature branches (such as feature-x-dev, jane-feature-x-dev).
Will dispose the on .

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.Name
member.summary: The name identifying the Stack.

member.name: P:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.Workspace
member.summary: The Workspace the Stack was created from.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.CreateAsync(System.String,Pulumi.Automation.Workspace,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new stack using the given workspace, and stack name. It fails if a stack with that name already exists.
member.param: The Workspace the Stack was created from.
member.exception: If a stack with the provided name already exists.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.SelectAsync(System.String,Pulumi.Automation.Workspace,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Selects stack using the given workspace, and stack name. It returns an error if the given Stack does not exist.
member.param: The Workspace the Stack was created from.
member.exception: If a stack with the provided name does not exists.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.CreateOrSelectAsync(System.String,Pulumi.Automation.Workspace,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tries to create a new Stack using the given workspace, and stack name if the stack does not already exist, or falls back to selecting an existing stack. If the stack does not exist, it will be created and selected.
member.param: The name of the identifying stack.
The Workspace the Stack was created from.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.GetConfigValueAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the config value associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key to use for the config lookup.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.GetConfigAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the full config map associated with the stack in the Workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.SetConfigValueAsync(System.String,Pulumi.Automation.ConfigValue,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets the config key-value pair on the Stack in the associated Workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.SetConfigAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,Pulumi.Automation.ConfigValue},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets all specified config values on the stack in the associated Workspace.
member.param: The map of config key-value pairs to set.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.RemoveConfigValueAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes the specified config key from the Stack in the associated Workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.RemoveConfigAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes the specified config keys from the Stack in the associated Workspace.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.RefreshConfigAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets and sets the config map used with the last update.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.UpAsync(Pulumi.Automation.UpOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Creates or updates the resources in a stack by executing the program in the Workspace.
https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/cli/pulumi_up/
member.param: Options to customize the behavior of the update.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.PreviewAsync(Pulumi.Automation.PreviewOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Performs a dry-run update to a stack, returning pending changes.
https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/cli/pulumi_preview/
member.param: Options to customize the behavior of the update.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.RefreshAsync(Pulumi.Automation.RefreshOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Compares the current stacks resource state with the state known to exist in the actual cloud provider. Any such changes are adopted into the current stack.
member.param: Options to customize the behavior of the refresh.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.DestroyAsync(Pulumi.Automation.DestroyOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Destroy deletes all resources in a stack, leaving all history and configuration intact.
member.param: Options to customize the behavior of the destroy.

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.GetOutputAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the current set of Stack outputs from the last .

member.name: M:Pulumi.Automation.XStack.GetHistoryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a list summarizing all previews and current results from Stack lifecycle operations (up/preview/refresh/destroy).
